item.title: Out of the Way 25
item.description: Veronica Ronnie Burke wakes up on a different Mount Lago. Feed: https://servingworlds.com/feed/podcast/free-podcast/

item.title: Inside s1: An o1-Style Reasoning Model That Cost Under $50 to Train with Niklas Muennighoff
item.description: Today, we're joined by Niklas Muennighoff, a PhD student at Stanford University, to discuss his paper, “S1: Simple Test-Time Scaling.” We explore the motivations behind S1, as well as how it compares to OpenAI's O1 and DeepSeek's R1 models. We dig into the different approaches to test-time scaling, including parallel and sequential scaling, as well as S1’s data curation process, its training recipe, and its use of model distillation from Google Gemini and DeepSeek R1... Feed: https://feeds.megaphone.fm/MLN2155636147
